about.title: About me
about.text: My name is Denis Weinhardt, I am 43 years old, married, and a proud father of two children. After many years as an enthusiastic IT aficionado, I decided in 2023 to pursue my dream and advance my professional career in IT. Since February 2023, I have been intensively expanding my knowledge and successfully completed my retraining as an IT specialist in application development.
about.career: Currently, I work at Siemens, a globally leading technology company. At the same time, I am completing a certification program as a full-stack developer to further enhance my technical skills and facilitate my transition into an IT career.
about.career2: My goal is to develop modern and efficient software solutions that create real value. In doing so, I bring not only technical expertise and creativity but also passion and a strong willingness to learn. I am excited to take on new challenges and actively shape the digital world!
about.search: Are you seeking a problem solver? Throughout my journey of private and academic IT education, I have developed strong skills in identifying and analyzing challenges in various technical environments.
about.search2: Do you look for a team player? During my training, I participated in several collaborative projects, where I applied my growing knowledge and gained hands-on experience in solving real-world IT problems as part of a team.

skills.title: My skills
skills.text: I have experience in software development and in implementing projects with various technologies and concepts.

port.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

contact.title: Contact
contact.headline: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

policy.text2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
